description: The source code being translated into a Standard Concept.
comment: Original source code to be mapped.

description: A foreign key to the Source Concept being translated into a Standard Concept. This is either 0 or a number above 2 billion, reserved for site-specific codes and mappings.
A foreign key to the VOCABULARY table defining the vocabulary of the source code being translated to a Standard Concept.
comment: Vocabulary identifier for the source code.

description: An optional description of the source code to compare with the name of the Standard Concept.
comment: Optional description for the source code.

description: The target Concept to which the source code is being mapped.
The Vocabulary of the target Concept.
The date when the mapping instance was first recorded.
The date when the mapping instance became invalid because it was deleted or superseded by a new relationship. Default value is 31-Dec-2099.
Reason the mapping instance was invalidated. Possible values are D (deleted), U (replaced with an update), or NULL when valid_end_date has the default value.
comment: Invalidation reason for the mapping instance.
